Date: Monday, 5/19/1978
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Pedro Borbon Sr.



Date: Sunday, 5/25/1978
Subject: Progress of Alberto Lois
Dear Sir,
Alberto Lois has nothing more to prove at AA Nashville Sounds!
He has an AVG of .288 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
